title: Point of danger: agriculture's first line of defence
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Eric Thompson
brief_description: An insight into the work of quarantine officers inspecting imports from abroad to detect plant diseases and insect pests which may bring ruin and destruction to Australian agriculture if introduced into this country.
title_for_label: Point of danger: agriculture’s first line of defence
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Eric Thompson
description: An insight into the work of quarantine officers inspecting imports from abroad to detect plant diseases and insect pests which may bring ruin and destruction to Australian agriculture if introduced into this country.
